extendedInfo.description: Charity Miles is a free app that empowers you to earn money for charities while walking, running or biking-- everyday.Just choose a charity and hit the streets.  As you walk, run or bike, the app will track your distance and you'll earn money for your charity: 10Â¢ per mile for bikers; 25Â¢ per mile for walkers and runners, all up to $1,000,000 courtesy of our corporate sponsors.And this is just the beginning. As you walk, run or bike with Charity Miles, you also help us attract more sponsors to increase our sponsorship pool for everyone.So please join the movement. And please invite your friends. Because changing the world is a team sport!

reviews.title: Fun, decent, but not great
reviews.comment: I love walking for charity. It does give me motivation and drive. However, I often spend more time on an elliptical at the gym more than outside walking. I also dislike Facebook and Twitter, and really wish they\'d get with the times and add a Google+ option to share the minor victories.
reviews.author: Grace Conyers

reviews.title: Great concept
reviews.comment: Love the concept of this app. I use it often as a motivator to walk my & walk a longer distance. Unfortunately I haven\'t been able to accept sponsorship cuz it won\'t connect to FB. Please help!
reviews.author: Mary Lee

reviews.title: No problems with connecting
reviews.comment: Used this app for first time on 28 mile rural road bike route and had no problems connecting or transferring info to Facebook. (I chose option where only I can see the info posted on my wall) Great app and fun way to donate to your fav charity!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot get it to post
reviews.comment: I haven\'t been able to get it to post to Facebook.   Gives me error code 17329140.  Otherwise i love the app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A good idea but a waste
reviews.comment: This was a great idea for an app, but a waste of my time so far. I tried to download it yesterday and it wouldn\'t. It was able to download today and I tried to use it, but it wouldn\'t connect to Facebook with wifi or if I used my data. So unfortunate.
reviews.author: Carrie Scott

reviews.title: Nice idea ... tech issues
reviews.comment: I\'ve used the app twice.  It seems to be having difficulty sharing the info to my facebook.  It takes several attempts (3 or more) to get the upload to happen.  I\'ve only gotten it to work once.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: This app has a lot of problems. I can never seem to log in with Facebook. Which is the reason why I don\'t use charity miles anymore. Either fix the bug...or I\'ll have to remove this app.
reviews.author: Jennifer Harris

reviews.title: Fb link
reviews.comment: Facebook link just doesnt work. I have tried on many occassions to link through wifi and 3g and neither works. I would love to be able to earn money for charities while out walking but what is the point when i cant actually get it without posting on fb through the app?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to love it.
reviews.comment: The concept is awesome but lately it cannot log in to Facebook, which makes it a useless app. FIX THIS PLEASE!
reviews.author: Vizsla Luv

reviews.title: PLEASE FIX!!! Can\'t recommend to friends...
reviews.comment: Love idea, hate execution. Please fix FB link or intro other methods to sign in/accept sponsorships. My last 10+ workouts have not been sponsored even when I\'m logged in.
reviews.author: Phu Vo

reviews.title: Really love this
reviews.comment: Im a CNA so im constantly walking and running around at work Im happy that i can work and do something charitable at the same time! Great idea and great app :)
reviews.author: Reeses Piece

reviews.title: Good while it lasted
reviews.comment: Used this app for months without issue. As of May 15 2013...it wont post my miles to facebook and although ive emailed them multiple times  the problem still remains.I liked this app when it worked! Please get this issue fixed.
reviews.author: Lauren Baginski

reviews.title: What is the deal?
reviews.comment: I\'ve got 3G service where I workout. Yet, it tells me I have to have an internet connection. Now I\'m at home, with Wi-Fi, and its saying the same thing. This is getting ridiculous. When the internet is working, it wont let me post anyway. Ridiculous.
reviews.author: Nicky Bell

reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this!
reviews.comment: Thank you for putting this together.  I don\'t mind starting it up with my other running fitness apps.  I do hope that it can one day be used on a treadmill.  It\'s cold here in the northland, but because of the contribution to my favorite charity, I\'m happy to take it outdoors.
reviews.author: Laura Ackerman

reviews.title: Great idea if it worked well
reviews.comment: I can\'t upload my miles to Facebook (facebook wont let me log in from the charity miles app) and there\'s no info on the Google play store about which to contact for help. Phenomenal idea though.
reviews.author: Annalisa Webb-Gordon

reviews.title: No good with Android
reviews.comment: At first worked well with Android, now won\'t accept sponsorships nor post to Facebook. They say they\'ve been trying to fix the problem since May, but still doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Andrea Yancey

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Love the idea of the app but it has never allowed my sponsorship to go through on facebook. Have not figured out what I am doing wrong.
reviews.author: Sheila Leet

reviews.title: Good when it works
reviews.comment: The app makes you accept sponsorship by sharing your activity to.Facebook. If you don\'t do that your work isn\'t accepted.  The app has been broken for three days and they are asking  you to email your results, which defeats the purpose of the app itself.
reviews.author: Suzanne Brooks

reviews.title: *sigh*
reviews.comment: I love this app... WHEN IT WORKS!! Unfortunately, more than half the time it won\'t sponser my runs because it says I have no internet connection, even though I DO. Please fix this!!
reviews.author: AuBrey Linder

reviews.title: FIX IT
reviews.comment: Please! It\'s so frustrating! This used to be my go-to app and now it\'s pointless when it doesn\'t upload to Facebook to be sponsored. I\'m uninstalling for now. I\'ll come back when it\'s fixed.
reviews.author: Amanda Elizabeth
